instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00281: Fan spins and CPU warm but no usb activity
threads.message:
Have this board that doesn't boot. The fan spins and the cpu is warm but no usb activity. First i found previous work done, they had soldered C4109 to R4457(1) and to ground. This is due to it's pads being missing. In anywise, i corrected the cap connection by soldering it to C4110 (1) and ground. I do get .6v for PP0V6_SLEEP1_BUCK0. I currently don't have an identical board, but a 00239 also reads 0.6v too.

The below reading from U7800 
PM_PCH_SYS_PWROK - 3.3
PM_PCH_PWROK - 3.3
ALL_SYS_PWRGD - 3.3
PM_RSMRST_L - 3.3

Granted, it appears U7800 does have sign of corrosion clean up.

threads.title: 820-00281: Fan spins and CPU warm but no usb activity
threads.message: Do you get VCORE and PLT_RST_L?

threads.title: 820-00281: Fan spins and CPU warm but no usb activity
threads.message:
PLT_RST_L are reading - 3.3
CPU_PWRGD - 1

PPVCC_S0_CPU - 0.7
PPVCORE_S0_GPU - 0.9
GPUVCORE_PGOOD - 3.3
GPUVCORE_EN - 3.3

PPVCCIO_S0_CPU - 0.98
PPVCCGT_S0_CPU - 0
PPVCCSA_S0_CPU - 0.9
PP1V2_S3_CPUDDR - 1.2

threads.title: 820-00281: Fan spins and CPU warm but no usb activity
820-00281: Fan spins and CPU warm but no usb activity
threads.message: Would you happen to a good BIOS or is a clean ME enough, which i already flashed with the same result.

threads.title: 820-00281: Fan spins and CPU warm but no usb activity
threads.message:
When board doesn't boot, if you suspect BIOS, need to try FULL known good working BIOS.
Clean ME region on it, of course.

threads.title: 820-00281: Fan spins and CPU warm but no usb activity
threads.message: Put in good BIOS and clean ME. Same issue.

threads.title: 820-00281: Fan spins and CPU warm but no usb activity
threads.message:
"PPVCC_S0_CPU - 0.7"
Board starts with this value, or do you note some variations in the first 10s?

Did you check each time for USB activity?

threads.title: 820-00281: Fan spins and CPU warm but no usb activity
threads.message:
PPVCC_S0_CPU starts at around 1.09 and then regulates until it stops at 0.7
When i plug in my usb adapter, it flashes on for like a second.

threads.title: 820-00281: Fan spins and CPU warm but no usb activity
threads.message:
Not easy to work after someone else.
Inspect for other knocked off components.
